title: The Pizza Dough King
description: The Pizza Dough King is the life story of Dino Parelli told in his own words and thoughts, from his senior year in high school on. Dino, Ellie and an employee he calls the Frock build a business around an unusual niche market. His wry sense of humor lets him poke fun at himself as well as others. Each success comes at a price. Watch his outlook and demeanor shift with age and events. PDK combines a poignant and emotional story with insight regarding corporate ethics and individual morals.
author: Sandy Graham
